  • Method Details

    • setItem

      public void setItem(ItemModel item)
      Sets an object on the step if it's currently free. Accepts either an Exit or an Item. Otherwise, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      item - the Item to place on this step
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the step is already used
      IllegalArgumentException - if the object is neither an Exit nor an Item

    • setExit

      public void setExit(ExitModel exit)
      Sets an object on the step if it's currently free. Accepts either an Exit or an Item. Otherwise, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      exit - the Exit to place on this step
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the step is already used
      IllegalArgumentException - if the object is neither an Exit nor an Item
